sentences.sContent: Interface that you implement to handle result of the license check.
sentences.sContent_eng: Interface that you implement to handle result of the license check.
sentences.sCn: 您可以通过实现这个接口来处理许可检查的结果。

sentences.sContent: To help lower costs, IBM offers flexible virtualization license costs, where you pay only for the number of virtual resources that you have deployed.
sentences.sContent_eng: To help lower costs, IBM offers flexible virtualization license costs, where you pay only for the number of virtual resources that you have deployed.
sentences.sCn: 为了帮助降低成本，IBM 提供灵活的虚拟化许可证费用机制，您只需根据已经部署的虚拟资源数量付费。

sentences.sContent: Since you have no license, you are not allowed to drive.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since you have no license, you are not allowed to drive.
sentences.sCn: 因为你没有驾驶执照，所以不允许你开车。

remMethod.val: 酒后驾车， 吊销执照 (license) 是教训 (lesson)

words.tran: 得到许可的；领有执照的
持牌人；执照持有者；获许可的人；领到执照的人
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）
